B

bitMask(int) - Static method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitSet
Calculates a mask to represent the bit at which a specific index will be stored within a long word.
bitsConsumed - Variable in class com.shouldis.bitset.DensityXOrShift
The internal counter to track how many bits of DensityXOrShift.booleanWord have been consumed by DensityXOrShift.nextBoolean().
BitSet - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Represents a fixed number of bits stored within an internal long array, mapping positive integer indices to individual bits and facilitating the manipulation of those individual bits or ranges of bits, as well as retrieving their boolean values.
BitSet(int) - Constructor for class com.shouldis.bitset.BitSet
Creates a BitSet with the specified number of bits indices.
BitSet(BitSet) - Constructor for class com.shouldis.bitset.BitSet
Creates a BitSet which is a clone of the specified BitSet set.
BitSpliterator - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of Spliterator that is meant to be used in conjunction with BitSets.
BitSpliterator(int, int) - Constructor for class com.shouldis.bitset.BitSpliterator
Creates a BitSpliterator with the specified starting and ending position.
BitSpliterator.Array - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitSpliterator used to stream all values within a specified integer array representing indices in an order appropriate to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
BitSpliterator.Dead - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitSpliterator used to stream the indices of dead bits within a BitSet, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
BitSpliterator.Live - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitSpliterator used to stream the indices of live bits within a BitSet, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
BitSpliterator.Range - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitSpliterator used to stream all indices of a specified range, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
bitwiseFunction(long, long) - Method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator.And
 
bitwiseFunction(long, long) - Method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator
Calculates the result of the bitwise operation represented by this BitwiseSpliterator between the specified words from BitwiseSpliterator.set1 and BitwiseSpliterator.set2.
bitwiseFunction(long, long) - Method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator.Or
 
bitwiseFunction(long, long) - Method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator.XOr
 
BitwiseSpliterator - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitSpliterator that is creates a stream of indices that represents which bits will be live after performing a BitwiseSpliterator.bitwiseFunction(long, long) between the words of 2 BitSets at the same word index.
BitwiseSpliterator(BitSet, BitSet, int, int) - Constructor for class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator
Creates a BitwiseSpliterator with the specified starting and ending position.
BitwiseSpliterator.And - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the AND operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
BitwiseSpliterator.Or - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the OR operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
BitwiseSpliterator.XOr - Class in com.shouldis.bitset
Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the XOR operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
bitwiseWord(int) - Method in class com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator
Calculates the result of BitwiseSpliterator.bitwiseFunction(long, long) on the words at the specified wordIndex.
booleanWord - Variable in class com.shouldis.bitset.DensityXOrShift
The field of bits used by DensityXOrShift.nextBoolean() to more efficiently produce boolean values which are true at the rate determined by DensityXOrShift.density.
boundDensity(double, int) - Static method in class com.shouldis.bitset.DensityXOrShift
Ensures that the specified density is within the acceptable range depending on depth such that it will fall in [2-depth, 1 -2-depth].
boundDepth(int) - Static method in class com.shouldis.bitset.DensityXOrShift
Ensures that the specified depth is within the range [1, 63].
boundPercentage(double) - Static method in class com.shouldis.bitset.DensityXOrShift
Ensures that the specified density is within the range [0, 1].
